attributes.action: Change if someone kills a dog from criminal damage to murder
attributes.additional_details: Because it a killing of a dog a family member and it should not be convicted of something more than crimal damage
attributes.background: Change the law of a killing of a dog from someone else from crimal damage to something more  dogs are not property dogs are family

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624536
